mapper.insert: insert into employee (name, email, age, admin, status, dept_id, hiredate) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{age}, #{admin}, #{status}, #{deptId}, #{hiredate})
mapper.update: update employee set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, age = #{age}, admin = #{admin}, status = #{status}, dept_id = #{deptId}, hiredate = #{hiredate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, email, age, admin, status, dept_id, hiredate from employee
select id, name, email, age, admin, status, dept_id, hiredate from employee
